content:
Hey all, jco v1.13.0 has been released:

https://www.npmjs.com/package/@bytecodealliance/jco/v/1.13.0
https://github.com/bytecodealliance/jco/releases/tag/jco-v1.13.0

The most important update from this release was getting up to date on componentize-js which of course updates StarlingMonkey underneath and exposes more functionality up through jco componentize.

Please download it and give it a try!

@bytecodealliance/jco
JavaScript tooling for working with WebAssembly Components. Latest version: 1.13.0, last published: 10 minutes ago. Start using @bytecodealliance/jco in your project by running `npm i @bytecodealliance/jco`. There are 9 other projects in the npm registry using @bytecodealliance/jco.
Release jco-v1.13.0 ¬∑ bytecodealliance/jco

Victor Adossi has marked this topic as unresolved.
